moves.name: Bubble Beam
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of lowering the target’s Speed by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: X Sp. Atk All
moves.effect: Raises the Sp. Atk of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Let’s Brainstorm!
moves.effect: Raises the Sp. Atk and Speed of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Brine
moves.effect: This move’s power is doubled when the target’s remaining HP is at half or below.

passives.name: First Aid 2
passives.description: Restores the user’s HP by approximately 20% of its maximum HP the first time it is in a pinch each battle.

passives.name: Revenge Boost 1
passives.description: Has a chance (20%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when the user is hit by an attack move.
